item.title: Representation Noising: A Defence Mechanism Against Harmful Finetuning
item.description: RepNoise: a novel defense against harmful fine-tuning of LLMs by removing information about harmful representations, generalizing across different harmful tasks, and maintaining LLM capabilities.
